蛂字的基本解释

蛂
bié
即“金龟子”，昆虫，种类很多，体多为卵圆形，各节能自由开闭，危害植物的叶、花、芽及果实等。

蛂字的汉语字典释义

[①]［bié］
［《廣韻》蒲結切，入屑，並。］
见“蛂蟥”。

蛂字的康熙字典解释

【申集中】【虫字部】　蛂； 康熙笔画：11； 页码：页1080第12
【唐韻】【集韻】?蒲結切，音蹩。【玉篇】蟥蛢也。【爾雅·釋蟲】蛂，蟥蛢。【註】甲蟲也。大如虎，豆綠色。今江東呼黃蛢。　又【類篇】敷勿切，音拂。方未切，音沸。駢迷切，音鼙。義?同。

蛂字的源字形

字源演变：

楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
蛂字的起名意思

暂无。

Clam
Basic explanation of words
Clam
bié
Namely "cockchafer", there are many kinds of insects, mostly ovoid in shape, and each energy-saving free opening and closing, harming plant leaves, flowers, buds and fruits.
Clam

[①]［bié］
["Guangyun" Pu knot cut, into the scraps, and. ]
See "蛂蟥".

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Shenzhen Collection] [Insect Character Department] 　蛂; Kangxi Strokes: 11; Page Number: Page 1080 Page 12
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun]? Pu knot cut, bad sound. 【Jade articles】蟥蛢 also. [Erya·Release insects] chrysanthemum, chrysanthemum. [Note] The beetle is also. Big as a tiger, bean green. Today Jiangdong calls Huangzhu.　[Classes] Do not cut, sound and whisk. The side is not cut, the sound is boiling. Pian fan cut, Yin Ku. Righteous? Same.
